com.github.davidmoten.reels

Class AbstractActor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.davidmoten.reels.AbstractActor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActorDoNothing, DeadLetterActor

    public abstract class AbstractActor<T>
extends Object
implements Actor<T>
    Convenience class as most of the time we will just implement onMessage.
